document_data.name: Lamb Talthaek
document_data.mainbody: '''Lamb talthaek''' was a type of local pie-like dish from the city of [[Arrabar]] in the [[Vilhon Reach]].
document_data.Description: Talthaek was a [[lamb]] meat stuffed pie, popular for its rich, creamy, brown gravy sauce that poured out of its pastry crust when cut into.
document_data.History: ''Circa'' the {{YearlinkName|1373}}, lamb talthaek was one of the specialties of the [[Dark She Looks Upon Me]] eatery in the Mercantile District of Arrabar. That dish, along with [[roast beef]] were favorite dishes of [[Vambran Matrell]] of the noble [[House Matrell]] and member of the [[Order of the Sapphire Crescent]].
